summary:
Xanthi is my first follower mod. I treat it currently as it is in alpha state yet. Level 5th, autolevel, dualwielding with 2 scimitars. She belongs to a lovely Temptress race. 

Current version - removed: sunglasses, added: circlet with waterbreathing effect.
descriptionHtml:
Xanthi is my first follower mod. I treat it currently as it is in alpha state yet. Level 5th, autolevel, dualwielding with 2 scimitars. She belongs to a lovely Temptress race and temporaly wears a red Temptress Outfit. 

You can find her in Dead Man\'s Inn in Falkreath. She stands naked there - just give her anything like circlet and she\'ll put all mentioned stuff on...


CREDITS

To make a follower look this way I used those wonderful mods (thank you guys, your job is amazing):

1. UNP Dimonized + Fitness Body:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16731

2. Temptress Race
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717

3. Apachii SkyHair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
author: Boiledhash
